name: CIAM-Passwordless-Protect-Threat-Detection-Subflow

settings.csp: worker-src 'self' blob:; script-src 'self' https://cdn.jsdelivr.net https://code.jquery.com https://devsdk.singularkey.com http://cdnjs.cloudflare.com 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval';

nodeTitle.value: Create PingOne Protect Risk with user and Environment details

nodeDescription.value: Should have required variables to start the risk evaluation.
Check if PingOne protect has detected a BOT or AITM attack
Response back when a threat is detected.

annotation.value: Input Schema:  required are: skriskcomponent, userName, flowType, ipAddress and optional are: userID, applicationId, SessionId, riskPolicyID, customAttributes
Take action based on threat detected. Visit PingOne Protect documentation for more information on this.
Sends back: PingOne Risk Level, PignOne Risk ID, PingOne Recommended Action values.
Create Protect Risk Evaluation after getting required inputs.

nodeDescription.value: Error While creating PingOne Protect Risk Evaluation
Add input variables to check for null/empty
